text: Nipele nachiweni chindu mpela bahali jajikolochekwe ni lindala, chachiwanganyiche ni mooto. Sooni naweni ŵandu ŵaŵachipundile chinyama ni chinyago chakwe, ni liina lyakwe likumanyika kwa namba jila. Ŵele ŵandu ŵajimi mungulugulu bahali jajikolochekwe ni lindala ali akamulile ing'wenyeng'wenye iŵapegwile ni Akunnungu.
